info.description: This is the Fast Note Sync Service HTTP API.
info.title: Fast Note Sync Service HTTP API

get.description: Get full system configuration information, requires admin privileges

post.description: Modify full system configuration information, requires admin privileges

get.description: Get system information and Go runtime data, requires admin privileges
Get raw binary data of an attachment by path, supports strong cache control

parameters.description: Is in recycle bin // 是否在回收站
parameters.name: isRecycle

delete.description: Permanently delete a specific attachment record and its physical file

get.description: Get attachment metadata (FileDTO) by path

parameters.description: Is in recycle bin // 是否在回收站
parameters.name: isRecycle

get.description: Get attachment list for current user with pagination, search, filter, and sort support

parameters.description: Is in recycle bin // 是否在回收站
parameters.name: isRecycle

parameters.description: Sort by field // 排序字段
parameters.name: sortBy

get.description: Get folder info for current user by path or pathHash

post.description: Create a new folder or restore a deleted one by path

delete.description: Soft delete a folder by path or pathHash

get.description: List non-deleted files in a specific folder with pagination and sorting

parameters.description: Sort by field // 排序字段
parameters.name: sortBy

get.description: List non-deleted notes in a specific folder with pagination and sorting

parameters.description: Sort by field // 排序字段
parameters.name: sortBy

get.description: Get the complete folder tree structure for a vault
Get folder list for current user by parent path or pathHash
Check service health status, including database connection
Get specific note content and metadata by path or path hash

parameters.description: Is in recycle bin // 是否在回收站
parameters.name: isRecycle

post.description: Handle note creation, modification, or renaming (identified by path change)
Append content to the end of a note

get.description: Get all other notes that link to the specified note

patch.description: Update or delete note frontmatter fields

get.description: Get all history records for a specific note with pagination

parameters.description: Is in recycle bin // 是否在回收站
parameters.name: isRecycle

get.description: Get specific note history content by history record ID

put.description: Restore note content to a specific history version

post.description: Move a note to a new path

get.description: Get other notes that the specified note links to

post.description: Insert content at the beginning of a note (after frontmatter)
Perform find and replace operation in a note, supporting regular expressions

get.description: Get note list for current user with pagination

parameters.description: Is in recycle bin // 是否在回收站
parameters.name: isRecycle

parameters.description: Whether to search content // 是否搜索内容
parameters.name: searchContent

parameters.description: Search mode (path, content, regex) // 搜索模式（路径、内容、正则）
parameters.name: searchMode

parameters.description: Sort by field // 排序字段
parameters.name: sortBy

post.description: Create a share token for a specific note or attachment, automatically resolve attachment references and authorize

get.description: Get raw binary data of a specific attachment via share token
Get specific note content (restricted read-only access) via share token

post.description:
Handle password change request for current user, validate old password and update new password.
处理当前用户的修改密码请求，验证旧密码并更新新密码。

get.description:
Handle request to get current user info.
处理获取当前用户信息的请求。

post.description:
Handle user login HTTP request, validate parameters and return auth token.
处理用户登录 HTTP 请求，验证参数并返回认证 Token。

Handle user registration HTTP request, validate parameters and call UserService. Registration may be disabled in server settings.
处理用户注册 HTTP 请求，验证参数并调用 UserService。注册功能可能在服务器设置中被禁用。

400.description: Invalid Parameters / Registration Disabled / User Already Exists

get.description: Get all note vaults for current user

post.description: Be used to create a new vault or update an existing vault configuration based on the ID in the request parameters

delete.description: Permanently delete a specific note vault and all associated notes and attachments

get.description: Get specific vault configuration details by vault ID
Get current server software version, Git tag, and build time
Get non-sensitive configuration required for frontend display, such as font settings, registration status, etc.

percent.description: Usage percentage per core // 每个核心的使用率

version.description: Service version number // 服务版本号

currentTime.description: Current system time // 当前系统时间

osPretty.description: Detailed OS name // 详细操作系统名称

timezone.description: Time zone name // 时区名称

timezoneOffset.description: Time zone offset in seconds // 时区偏移（秒）

uptime.description: System uptime // 系统运行时间

swapTotal.description: Total swap space // 交换区总量

swapUsed.description: Used swap space // 交换区已用

swapUsedPercent.description: Swap usage percentage // 交换区使用率

total.description: Total physical memory // 系统总内存

usedPercent.description: Memory usage percentage // 内存使用率

memAlloc.description: Allocated memory (bytes) // 已分配内存（字节）

memSys.description: Memory obtained from system (bytes) // 从系统获取的内存（字节）

memTotal.description: Total memory allocated (bytes) // 累计分配内存（字节）

numGc.description: Number of completed GC cycles // GC 次数

numGoroutine.description: Number of goroutines // Goroutine 数量

runtimeStatus.description: Go runtime status // Go 运行时状态

authTokenKey.description: Auth token key // 认证 Token 密钥

defaultApiFolder.description: Default API folder // 默认 API 目录

fileChunkSize.description: File chunk size // 文件分块大小

historyKeepVersions.description: History versions to keep // 历史版本保留数

historySaveDelay.description: History save delay // 历史保存延迟

registerIsEnable.description: Registration enablement // 是否开启注册

shareTokenExpiry.description: Share token expiry // 分享 Token 有效期

shareTokenKey.description: Share token key // 分享 Token 密钥

softDeleteRetentionTime.description: Soft delete retention time // 软删除保留时间

uploadSessionTimeout.description: Upload session timeout // 上传会话超时时间

registerIsEnable.description: Registration enablement // 是否开启注册

createdAt.description: Created at time // 创建时间

updatedAt.description: Updated at time // 更新时间

createdAt.description: Created at time // 创建时间

lastTime.description: Record update timestamp // 记录更新时间戳

updatedAt.description: Updated at time // 更新时间

rootFileCount.description: File count in root // 根目录中的文件数量

rootNoteCount.description: Note count in root // 根目录中的笔记数量

content.description: Content to append // 追加内容

createdAt.description: Created at time // 创建时间

lastTime.description: Record update timestamp // 记录更新时间戳

updatedAt.description: Updated at time // 更新时间

clientName.description: Client that made changes // 产生变更的客户端

content.description: Full historical content // 完整历史内容

createdAt.description: Creation time of this version // 此版本的创建时间

diffs.description: Text differences // 文本差异内容

id.description: History entry ID // 历史项 ID

noteId.description: Associated note ID // 笔记 ID

path.description: Note path at that time // 当时的笔记路径

vaultId.description: Associated vault ID // 保险库 ID

version.description: Historical version number // 历史版本号

historyId.description: History version ID // 历史版本 ID

context.description: Text context around link // 链接文本上下文

isEmbed.description: Is it an embed (![[...]]) // 是否为嵌入

linkText.description: Raw link text (optional) // 原始链接文本（可选）

baseHash.description: Base hash for sync // 同步基准哈希

baseHashMissing.description: Marks if baseHash is unavailable // 标记基准哈希是否缺失

createOnly.description: If true, fail if note already exists // 如果为 true，笔记已存在则失败

oldPathHash.description: Old path hash // 旧路径哈希

srcPath.description: Source path (for rename) // 源路径（用于重命名）

srcPathHash.description: Source path hash // 源路径哈希

pathHash.description: Current path hash // 当前路径哈希

createdAt.description: Created at time // 创建时间

lastTime.description: Record update timestamp // 记录更新时间戳

updatedAt.description: Updated at time // 更新时间

remove.description: Fields to remove // 待移除字段

updates.description: Fields to update // 待更新字段

content.description: Content to prepend // 头部添加内容

all.description: Replace all matches // 替换所有

failIfNoMatch.description: Fail if no match found // 若无匹配则失败

find.description: String to find // 查找内容

replace.description: String to replace with // 替换内容

matchCount.description: Number of matches found // 匹配数量

note.description: Updated note data // 更新后的笔记数据

createdAt.description: Created at time // 创建时间

fileLinks.description: Map of file link to actual path // 文件链接到实际路径的映射

lastTime.description: Record update timestamp // 记录更新时间戳

updatedAt.description: Updated at time // 更新时间

path_hash.description: Resource path Hash // 资源路径哈希

id.description: ID of the note or file table (primary resource ID) // 笔记或文件表 ID（主资源 ID）

type.description: Resource type: note or file // 资源类型：笔记（note）或文件（file）

avatar.description: Avatar URL or handle // 头像路径或名称

createdAt.description: Account created time // 账号创建时间

uid.description: User ID (primary key) // 用户唯一标识（主键）

updatedAt.description: Last updated time // 最后更新时间

credentials.description: Username or Email // 登录凭证（用户名或邮件）

fileCount.description: Number of files // 文件数量

fileSize.description: Size of files // 文件大小

noteCount.description: Number of notes // 笔记数量

noteSize.description: Size of notes // 笔记大小

id.description: Vault ID (optional for update) // 保险库 ID（可选，用于更新）

versionIsNew.description: Is there a new version // 是否有新版本

versionNewLink.description: New version download link // 新版本下载链接

versionNewName.description: New version name // 新版本名称
